``` ::: ::: # Origin {#origin} Calcaneus (lateral dorsal surface) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Insertion {#insertion} Bases of middle phalanges of digits 2-4 @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Nerve [Deep Fibular N.]({{< var ref-deep-fibular-nerve.path >}}) ([L5]({{< var ref-nerve-root.l5 >}}), [S1]({{< var ref-nerve-root.s1 >}})) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Action {#action} **MTP/PIP 2-4**: Extension @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # MMT "The EDL and the EDB muscles produce the motion of extension at the MTP and IP joints of the lateral four digits from a flexed position." @duttonDuttonOrthopaedicExamination2020 - Apply resistance dorsal surface of the proximal and distal phalanges into toe flexion @duttonDuttonOrthopaedicExamination2020
